comment_text: Aneezbob
my recommendation is @sugarcoatedsatansandwich

Iv had no experience with psychologists in Dubai but i’v had many experiences with therapists from the American center of psychology and neurology // ACPN they have branches all across the emirates in Dubai , abudhabi , Sharjah and Dubai . One of my former therapists moved to the Dubai branch she’s Persian and her name is faranak nowbakht a very excellent and understanding woman who now works in the Dubai branch . - as for abudhabi doctor junaid Hassim was my therapist for he past 10 months and he’s more than an amazing human being ! He’s very compassionate and understanding. https://www.americancenteruae.com/about-acpn/. You can visit there website . 
For the gals in abudhabi - the beat psychiatrist who also work in the center are DR tamer metwally & DR Ahmed  they’re very understanding and non judgmental. Contact me for more deets love you xo wishing y’all nothing but a journey full of  Growth and  continuous healing

@itsmollydarling American center for psychiatry and neurology. , doctor raoum & doctor junaid iv had  great experiences with them , dr junaid was my therapist for the past 10 months and he’s excellent pm me for details xo
If anyone is looking for help in Abudhabi please don’t hesitate  to pm me x sending you love and prayers.

I’m copy/pasting here the following anonymous message: “The LightHouse Arabia the centre for wellbeing  Dr Jamilah

There are a lot of psychologists/therapist/psychiatrist in The Lighthouse they have also good and relaxing vibe in their clinics. They main reason why I just stopped going on therapy last year was because it was not covered with my medical insurance. Around 700 aed -800 aed per session, and I needed to go to therapy twice a month. But if they have med.insurance that covers mental health services it is a good center. ❤️”

I’m copy/pasting here the following anonymous message: “Dr. Tanya dharamshi @ priory clinic, in health care city - dubai. I had a very positive experience with her. Shes someone i can talk to about anything and she helped me recover from depression and anxiety when i got really traumatized by my breakup. She made me realize that whatever i am feeling is real and theres so much strength inside me to recover from it. Before meeting her i was crying continuously for 2 years and found it hard to even get up and take a shower. I owe a lot to her for being.”

Anonymous recommendation: “Hii Jova, im a psychiatry intern so from my personal experiences I highly recommend 2 psychiatrists, Dr mohtasim in Al Amal Hospital Dubai. Dr Fasial and Mr Nasser al Riyami in sheikh khalifa medical city, behavioral sciences pavilion Abudhabi —- the 2nd one is a psychologist/hypnotherapist.”

Anonymous recommendation: “Hello! I can highly recommend Nathalie Khalaf in Dubai. https://www.instagram.com/nathalie.holistic.counselling. She is an unbelievable human, full of love and support, and also does counseling in Arabic as it is something very uncommon in our region. I had only two sessions with her and surprisingly needed no more - she now is a dear friend of mine. She can be contacted directly through her page and she will get in touch very quickly.”
Anonymous recommendation: “Dr. Paul Gelston - Registered CBT & Dr. Fiona Desira - Registered Clinical Psychologist. They’re both from Child Early Intervention Medical Center, Oud Metha Rd., Dubai”
thank you for this, jova! ❤️
G.r.e.a.t initiative 💜

American Centre Of Psychiatry and Neurology has a psychiatrist named Dr. Nasser AlHindi in the Dubai branch. He was always kind and very honest with me, he helped me find the right combination of medicine for me, and I'm feeling better than ever. The only complaint I have is that to get a medical report from them costs 150. So transferring psychiatrists or traveling and going to a new psychiatrist will cost you some money to prove you have your diagnosis.
Please do one for Abu Dhabi! Thank you very much. 💜
I recommend my sister @angelinefreedom. She is based in Dubai. She is a Mental Health Awareness advocate.

I recommend Dr Asad Sadiq at The Psychiatry & Therapy Center www.psychiatryandtherapy.ae  He is a British psychiatrist been working in Dubai for a few years. A gentle approach with heart, brain & soul.
